episodes.title: Infiltrating Cults & Extreme Haunted Houses | Reckless Ben & Danny Berk | Maximum Zach | #19
episodes.description: Zach is joined by internet superstars Reckless Ben and Danny Berk in this episode! They dive into their stunt-fueled pasts, why they infiltrated a cult, and how they went after the extreme "haunted house" McKamey Manor...and won! #sponsored. Prescriptions are up to a medical provider’s discretion. Visit JoinFound.com for more information.Danny Berk on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/danny_berk/Danny Berk on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@DannyBerkReckless Ben on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/recklessbenschneider/Reckless Ben on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@RecklessBen________________________________________________________________________Zach Holmes AKA Zackass from Jackass Forever, is on a mission to become the most Maximum Zach he can be. To do so, he'll interview the brightest minds in tech, science & medicine...and if he can't get them, he'll probably just talk to his comedy, Hollywood, porn & skater pals. Join The Patreon for the Maximum amount of extra content: https://www.patreon.com/MaximumZach Subscribe to the channel: https://www.youtube.com/zackass Listen on Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/maximum-zach/id1707698909 Listen on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/1j2PTiAN8kmvmvr6Un7QLZ?si=b9007e1555a14834 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zackass/ https://www.instagram.com/maxzachpod Book Zach On Cameo!https://www.cameo.com/zackassSTAND UP DATES: Jan 24- 27 at Looney Bin - Little Rock, AR - Tickets (https://lr.loonybincomedy.com/ShowDetails/dd699d4a-cdc6-4ad3-83f0-c75a1856c797/46a4734a-d472-4d42-9712-3574fd06ed97/Tons_Of_Fun_Tour/Little_Rock)Feb 2 at Soul Joel's - Pottstown, PA - Tickets (https://www.souljoels.com/shop/tickets/tonsoffun/)________________________________________________________________________Maximum Zach is produced by Cosmic MonkeyRecorded at F22 Studios - Burbank, CA#MaximumZach #Zackass #Jackass #RecklessBen #DannyBerk #McKameyManor #TheYellowDeli
